usage.cn: 假朋友从不会当面背叛你，都是背后。
usage.eng: Fake friends never betray in front of you. They always do it behind you.

usage.cn: 每个成功男人的背后都有一个女人，每个不成功男人的背后都有两个女人。
usage.eng: Behind every successful man, there is a woman. And behind every unsuccessful man, there are two.

usage.cn: 总有那么一些歌，让我们悲伤，让我们哭泣。但其实让我们哭泣的并不是那些歌本身，而是藏在回忆里的那些人。
usage.eng: Some songs can make you sad and cry when you hear them. But it's actually not the song that makes you cry, it's the people behind the memories.

usage.cn: 当我们说"这只是个玩笑"时, 其实包含了些许认真, 说"不知道"时, 却捎带了某中程度的认识, 说"不关心"却带着一丝牵挂, 说"没关系"时, 心里却在隐隐作痛
usage.eng: There is always a little truth behind every "JUST KIDDING", a little knowledge behind every "I DON'T KNOW", a little emotion behind every "I DON'T CARE", and a little pain behind every "IT'S OK".
